title: Practical Education Using H5P Interactive Books Based on Nursing Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Accessibility-optimized educational process based on smartphone technology for current practitioners

learning_goals: Using H5P interactive books, learners can enhance simulation-based clinical judgment accuracy to over 80%.
Through twice-weekly 90-minute live sessions, learners can evaluate their ability to analyze complex nursing scenarios.
Within three months, learners can achieve a usage satisfaction score of 4.0/5.0 (Likert scale) or higher for H5P content in mobile environments.
At the end of the 6-month course, over 75% of learners will submit project-based solutions applicable to real clinical settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
